file_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named ^.*\.(conf|rules) in /etc/audit/ exists and does not have permissions --x-wxrwx
Ensure any file(s) named ^.*\.(conf|rules) in /etc/audit/ exists and is owned by user 0
Ensure any file(s) named ^.*\.(conf|rules) in /etc/audit/ exists and is owned by group 0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /var/spool/cron/ exists and matches pattern ^([-0-9*\/,A-Za-z]+\s+){5}([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\h+([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/cron.d exists and matches pattern ^([-0-9*\/,A-Za-z]+\s+){5}([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\h+([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/cron.hourly exists and matches pattern ^\h*([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\s([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/cron.daily exists and matches pattern ^\h*([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\s([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/cron.weekly exists and matches pattern ^\h*([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\s([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/cron.monthly exists and matches pattern ^\h*([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\/usr\/sbin\/aide\s([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named aidecheck.service in /etc/systemd/system/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*ExecStart=\/usr\/sbin\/aide\h+([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$
Ensure at least one file(s) named aidecheck.service in /usr/lib/systemd/system/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*ExecStart=\/usr\/sbin\/aide\h+([^#\n\r]+\h+)?--(check|update)\b.*$

Ensure systemd 'aidecheck.timer' unit 'UnitFileState' property equals enabled
